attributes.title: New Game+ #16
attributes.description: This week we answer emails about early review copies, region locking, and Ben teaches us Japanese?!

attributes.title: New Game+ #17
attributes.description: What are your favorite co-op experiences in games? Also, what game mechanics turn you off of a game? Send us your questions to be answered on the show at glitchplease@roosterteeth.com!

attributes.title: New Game+ #18
attributes.description: Ben has prepared his first lesson for our cast to learn Japanese! We start out with some common terms you'll see in video games.

attributes.title: New Game+ #19
attributes.description:
What do you think about hand-holding mechanics in games? Are they a bad idea? Also let's learn more Japanese!





For anyone wanting to follow along: get your own reference cards HERE and HERE!

attributes.title: New Game+ #20
attributes.description: Our suggestions for the best games to play for October spooky time. And what's the best route to getting a good gaming PC? Buying or Building?

attributes.title: New Game+ #21
attributes.description: What is your preferred way to get Ultimate Weapons? Also we have our first Japanese test with PUNISHMENTS! How do you fare? Get your own Glitch Please reference cards HERE, HERE, and HERE.

attributes.title: New Game+ #22
attributes.description: Are loot boxes and micro-transactions turning away new game players? And how can we fix micro-transactions?

attributes.title: New Game+ #23
attributes.description: Let's check out the new Xbox One X and discuss if the jump to 4K is worth it right now.

attributes.title: New Game+ #24
attributes.description: Humble Bundle being acquired by IGN has brought up a lot of questions about the ethics of a media outlet being connected with a publisher. How do you feel about this?

attributes.title: New Game + #25
attributes.description: Do you pursue romantic side quests in games and what are your favorites?

attributes.title: New Game + #26
attributes.description: What game on your backlog are you determined to get to before the end of the year?

attributes.title: New Game+ #27
attributes.description: What are the best and worst controllers? And what are some of the weirdest control schemes?

attributes.title: New Game+ #28
attributes.description: Are Nintendo's odd business practices something to emulate, and will they be tempted to change them soon? And what are the Glitches' holiday gift suggestions?

attributes.title: New Game+ #29
attributes.description: Do you ever worry about your validity as a female gamer and is that changing? Also, what games have you gone back to that don't hold up?

attributes.title: New Game+ #30
attributes.description: If you were required to get a gaming related tattoo what would you get?

attributes.title: New Game+ #31
attributes.description: What video games would make the best plays or musicals?

attributes.title: New Game + #32
attributes.description: When have you made a video game really hard only to realize later that you're dumb? Also what are you predicting Nintendo will show at the January Direct?

attributes.title: New Game + #33
attributes.description: Have you ever made predictions on video games and gotten them completely wrong? Also what hobbies do you have outside of gaming?

attributes.title: New Game+ #34
attributes.description: What are the things that made us first love video games?

attributes.title: New game+ #35
attributes.description: Join Ashley, Cole, and Alfredo as they answer questions from the community about mini games and video game stigmas.

attributes.title: It's Cool To Be Cruel - #36
attributes.description: What is the game that defined a certain game genre for you? And what was the cruelest thing you ever did to NPCs in a game?

attributes.title: Not So Trendy - #37
attributes.description: What are some video game trends you missed out on? Did you ever go back to check them out?

attributes.title: Endings That Ended Us - #38
attributes.description:
What is the biggest surprise ending sprung on you in a game?
What is your favorite browser based game that you played?

from: 
Callum McAlpine

attributes.title: I Love This Game But Stay Away - #39
attributes.description: Do you have a game you love to play but you wouldn't necessarily recommend to others for some reason? and What's your favorite browser game?

attributes.title: Let's Get Portable - #40
attributes.description: What are the best and worst handhelds other than the Switch? Also, what game has the best character creator?

attributes.title: Let's Make a Labo
attributes.description: What would be your ultimate Nintendo Labo creation and how would you use it in a game?

attributes.title: Stop Before You Say Goodbye - #42
attributes.description: Many feel bad about chasing down injured monsters fleeing for survival in Monster Hunter World. What other games made you feel bad about winning? Also, what is the greatest amount of time you've put into a game that you haven't finished?

attributes.title: Cronch The Banana - #43
attributes.description: What was the first videogame that you bought with personal money that you earned from a job? What video game food are you hungry to try? And a SECRET QUESTION!

attributes.title: Best Game Pets - #44
attributes.description: What is the best pet in video games? And you’ve become a video game boss and have to design your own dungeon/tower/castle. What challenges, minions or traps to you implement to kill your pesky hero rival?

attributes.title: Vertical Horses Couldn't Drag Me Away - #45
attributes.description: What game-breaking glitch that you personally encountered in a video game do you think would actually be great to experience in real life? What is the best mount or vehicle in a video game?

attributes.title: Conker Deserves Better - #46
attributes.description: What is the sequel that got you to go back and play the earlier games in a franchise? and what is the worst sequel to a game?

attributes.title: We Got Skills - #47
attributes.description: Is there a game that taught you an actual life skill? And what was the worst online experience you had to date and how were you able to handle it?

attributes.title: Finally Time To Fish - #48
attributes.description: We finish the Labo fishing pole and go fishing! We're also joined by Brian Gaar to get his official Dad Seal Of Approval™.

attributes.title: The Best Worst Games - #49
attributes.description: What is the best worst video game you have played? and what is the best party game?

attributes.title: E3 Wishes and Dreams - #50
attributes.description: What are your pie-in-the-sky wishes for this year's E3 announcements? And what video game location do you want to be a real place you could visit?

attributes.title: Black Ops 4 Watch Party! - #51
attributes.description: Lets watch the new Call of Duty Black Ops 4 trailers and talk about what they announced

attributes.title: We Give Up! - #52
attributes.description: What game(s) had a puzzle/challenge that stopped you and made you put down the game and never return to it, at least so far? and whose opinion in the industry, other channel, or personality do you trust for suggestions?

attributes.title: The Ultimate Cosplay - #53
attributes.description:
What would be your ultimate cosplay if you could (and were required to) do it? Any race. Any story or game. Humanoid or not. Person or creature. Who (or what) would you want to be?

What are video games from your youth that today's kids just wouldn't understand why they were great?

attributes.title: The Best New Game Plus - #54
attributes.description: Considering all the leaks that happen every year before E3, do you guys think it’s better for a developer to ignore the leaks or for them to come out and get control over the leaks and rumors? What was your favorite game to use a new game+ feature and is there a game that does not offer new game+ that you wish did?

attributes.title: Game Marketing Is Weird - #56
attributes.description:
Games are sometimes not in their final form when presented at E3. In your opinion and experience, what games ended up way better than you expected and what games ended up way worse than you hoped?

What's the weirdest corporate promotion for a game you've seen?

attributes.title: Become One With The Tofu - #57
attributes.description:
Who is the best joke character in a game?

What is your favorite novel, comic, or any other piece of literature that is based on a video game?

attributes.title: Funko Pops Are Bad, Actually
attributes.description:
Post show questions:
Is there anything that you miss about the gaming industry of yesteryear? (demo discs, instruction booklets in games, etc.)

What should the Nintendo console after the Switch be?

attributes.title: We're Fashionable Zombies
attributes.description:
Let's say that you've been attacked by a zombie and are infected. You're going to turn into a zombie and there's no avoiding it. What kind of clothes do you want to be wearing for the rest of your unnatural unlife when you become undead?

What are your favorite game demos?

attributes.title: Goofy In All The Games
attributes.description:
If you could add Goofy from Kingdom Hearts into any game as your ally, what game would you choose and why?
What mash up of two video characters would create a monster of unspeakable horror?
Microsoft outlined its plans for next months Gamescom and used the phrase "all-new Xbox Hardware and accessories". They have since re-phrased their post, but if there is any truth to the potential hardware, what do you think it is?

attributes.title: Horrifying Game Mash-ups
attributes.description:
You get to choose any game sound to magically play in your real life whenever you want. What do you choose? It could be a sound effect or theme song?
What two games from the same dev would you love to see in a cross over event?

attributes.title: Who's Your Digital Waifu?
attributes.description:
Besides Cortana what video game character would you love to see as your personal assistant? What about Hate?

What is the weirdest left turn you have seen a video game take that you hated or didnt expect?

attributes.title: Tekken Centipede
attributes.description:
What game would you love to see pulled into Augmented Reality? 
What's the worst character you could put in Tekken 7?

attributes.title: Let's Put Some Games To Bed
attributes.description:
Do you prefer procedurally generated games that offer lots of variety or would you prefer strong scripted experiences that funnel you down certain paths?
What game series do you think should “take a rest”?

attributes.title: Tidus In Memorium
attributes.description:
What characters affected you the most in their death? who should have been killed off/etc.
What is a game that you would like to get the insanely produced character short treatment?

attributes.title: Your Grandma's Pokemon GO
attributes.description:
What Pokemon Go ripoff is the game we need and deserve?
What video character do you think would be a great Youtuber and what kind of videos would they make?

attributes.title: Captain Marvel Joins The Fight
attributes.description: After being sucked into more Henry Cavill talk, the Glitches talk about the Captain Marvel reveal and the future of the MCU!

attributes.title: Devil In The Details
attributes.description:
What's your favorite little detail in a game?
What do you hope the new mode in smash is and what characters do you hope make an appearance?

attributes.title: Let's Make Games Real
attributes.description:
What video game booth recreation would you like to see brought to life, not as a direct rip out of video game universe, but as a successfully built promotion?
If Nintendo goes the same route, what 20 games would you narrow down for the N64 Classic?

attributes.title: Squished By Thwompette
attributes.description:
With the popularity of Peachette and Bowsette can you come up with a ___ette that the internet wouldn't fuck?
What are the best PS4 exclusives for new owners?

attributes.title: Rogue On The Streets, Bard In The Sheets
attributes.description:
The fans demand to know what you think your co-workers? What video game class do you think they are?

What quality of life changes would you like to see come from PS or Xbox on the software side of things?

attributes.title: Preorder Your Cereal?!
attributes.description:
EBGames is selling pre-orders for a megaman cereal that includes a funko pop, what is the most ridiculous pre-order you have made or are aware of?
With Stardew Valley coming to mobile devices, what video game would ruin you if moved to your phone?
With James Gunn moving to the DC universe, What DC characters would the guardian of the galaxy actors (Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Batista)  fit into best?

attributes.title: Hunting Sean Bean
attributes.description: The Glitches discuss who'd they'd like to see as an elusive target in Hitman 2.

attributes.title: Smash Bros. Prayers Are Ansewered
attributes.description:
How much is too expensive when purchasing a game and for what features? Did you ever buy a game that you felt was way more expensive than it was worth?
There is a potential Smash Bros leak. What do you think? How viable do you think this is?

attributes.title: Oh The Horror... Games
attributes.description:
Are you playing any horror games? Any horror or halloween events going on that you are enjoying? Anything you'd like to go back to and try that you've heard is scary?
First images and footage of Geralt of Rivera have been released: What do you think?
TEAM GRINCH SMASH THEORY: YES NO

attributes.title: Sonic's Speed Metal Band
attributes.description:
What music video would you like to see made for a game?
What theoretical mobile game announcement would go even worse than Diablo Immortal?

attributes.title: Mr. Mime's Diddle Fingers
attributes.description:
How do you feel about companies locking content to additional physical hardware?
Whats the creepiest thing a real life pokemon could do?

attributes.title: Thanksgaming
attributes.description: What games make you thankful this year? What are the best Thanksgiving foods? And which would make the best food fight weapon?

attributes.title: Kingdom Hearts On Netflix?
attributes.description:
What game do you think would do well as a Netflix series? What would you sit and watch with minimal interactions, maybe story only?
What do you want out of a Superman game?

attributes.title: Lootbox Refunds?
attributes.description: When have you skipped something (work, school, etc.) to play video games? Whats the most game stopping glitch you've ever encountered? What if you could refund lootboxes?

attributes.title: Christmas Events To Remember
attributes.description:
What are your favorite holiday events, skins, or games?
What were some of the your top garbage moments in video games? What were just some of the shitty things that happened or you hated?

attributes.title: All I want for Christmas is an N64
attributes.description:
What are some of the fondest gaming related gifts that you have received?
Do you think games sales will suffer for these games/get passed up with such a late release when people are using the holidays to catch up on games?

attributes.title: A Look To 2019
attributes.description:
Looking forward to 2019, what are you excited for?
What other franchise could make a Super Smash Brothers clone that you would buy? Such as Disney, Warner Brothers, Blizzard, etc...

attributes.title: Runescape Is Back Baby!
attributes.description: What are your favorite free-to-play games? What games from 2018 did you miss?

attributes.title: 2019: The Year Bethesda Fails?
attributes.description: What do you think the state of the industry will be in 2019 and what about "the big 3"?

attributes.title: A Good Video Game Movie?
attributes.description: Ben and Jon talk about video game movies and what's coming out soon. Also, what "ultimate" game would you want made in a franchise?

attributes.title: Oscar Season For Video Games
attributes.description: Do you think there would ever be an awards season for video games? What podcasts or shows do you listen to while grinding?

attributes.title: The Final Level
attributes.description: Whats game in 2019 are you most excited for? What do you think is going to come out this year?
